about_the_game:
A brand new map. A Farmhouse, old creepy and haunted!

Features.


  • A medium sized house in the middle of nowhere.
  • Several rooms. The Entity can be in any of them!
  • A basement with some cool things there.
  • A second floor.
  • Only the host has to own the DLC for everyone in the lobby to play on this map.

content_descriptors.notes: It's a horror game in which you hunt ghosts.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu Equivalent Distro
  • Processor: 2Cores 2.0 Ghz 64 bit CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu Equivalent Distro
  • Processor: 2Cores 3.0 Ghz 64 bit CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB Video RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: A brand new map. A Farmhouse, old creepy and haunted! A medium sized house in the middle of nowhere. Several rooms. The Entity can be in any of them! A basement with some cool things there. A second floor. Only the host has to own the DLC for everyone in the lobby to play on this map.
